name: Eating for Two: 'Laborade'
description: We went to our first childbirth class on Sunday. Yikes! I hadn't seen videos like that since the sex-ed unit in seventh grade life science, when I came home one day and burst into tears in front of my mother:...

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a bottle and add enough water to make 1 quart. You can add an additional 8 ounces of water for a milder flavor, or you can flavor this blend with your favorite juice.
